title: Discover what it feels like to love where you live at Solis Garden!
posting_body: ["You'll Be a Happy Camper Living Here", 'Solis Garden Apartments in Hayward, CA', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'OR Text', '3', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'Solis Garden', '145 Lund Avenue, Hayward, CA, 94544', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a Studio, 1 Bath', 'Beautiful community conveniently located in a quiet residential neighborhood close to downtown Hayward, Near shopping centers, restaurants, and just about everything you could possibly need!', 'Solis offer Studio, 1, 2, 3 bedroom apartments that are newly renovated with gourmet kitchens equipped with top of line stainless steel appliances, high end gas stoves, modern cabinetry, stone countertops, wood-inspired flooring, brand new double pane windows, desirable open floor plans, distinctive energy efficient fixtures and many other meticulous finishing touches.', 'In addition to top of the line interiors, Solis also offers ample covered parking, convenient laundry facilities, oversized patios, and a sparkling pool.', 'Solis Garden Leasing Office.', 'Please visit Solis Garden Leasing Office at W. 20 Harder Road Hayward, CA 94544', 'Features', '- Stainless Appliances', '- Modern Single Panel Doors', '- Private Patio/Balcony', '- Brushed Nickel Finishes', '- 2" Wood Inspired Window Blinds', '- Wood-Inspired Flooring', '- Gas Stove', '- Bar Top Gathering*', '- Dishwasher*', '- Ceiling Fan', '- Newly Remodeled Apartment Homes', '- Washer and Dryer*', 'In Select Apartments', '- Stone Countertops', '- Microwave*', '- New Cabinetry', '- Mirrored Wardrobe Doors', '*In Select Homes', 'Community Amenities', '- Near Shopping and Dining', '- Refreshing Pool', '- Covered Parking', '- Clothes Care Center', '- Great Location', 'Pet Policy', 'Yes we are pet friendly.', 'our pet policy is a 500.00 deposit and a 50.00 monthly fee', 'Income Requirements:', 'Gross income 2.0 times amount of rent', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management
